content: X-BT-ER Stainless steel threaded studs Threaded stud for electrical connectors on steel in highly corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features No rework necessary on coated steel – corrosion protection remains intact Enhanced safety – allows electrical current to flow through the stud and then discharges it properly into the base material Portable, cordless system – eliminates the need for long electric supply cords Fast – ideal for fastening directly to coated or treated steel Corrosion-resistant – suitable for marine, offshore and petrochemical applications, power plants, etc. Applications Functional bonding Protective bonding Terminal connection Lightning protection Bonding and earthing/grounding For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel, Stainless steel, Cast iron Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 5/16 in Corrosion protection: Equivalent corrosion protection as A4(316) Technical Data | Base materials | Steel, Stainless steel, Cast iron | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 5/16 in | Corrosion protection | Equivalent corrosion protection as A4(316) | Environmental Conditions | Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution | Material | Duplex stainless steel (1.4462) | Point type | Blunt tip | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2252198 - Elec. connector X-BT-ER W6/3 SN 8 - Package Size 100 pc - 2194353 - Elec. connector X-BT-ER W10/7 SN 8 - Package Size 100 pc
